about.title: About **{{{ name }}}**:
about.embed.description:
Hey! I'm **{{{ name }}}**, a community bot designed for Discord.
I provide everything a community needs, brings needed utility content and keeps your place fun!

I was made by **iDroid27210** using [node.js](https://nodejs.org) ({{{ node }}}) with the API wrapper [discord.js](https://discord.js.org) ({{{ discord }}}).
You can check my commands using the `{{{ defaultPrefix }}}help` command.
Star my repository and contribute to my development on [GitHub](https://github.com/iDroid27210/homer)!

You can join the support server if you wanna get some assistance, just type `{{{ defaultPrefix }}}support` and follow the link.
Sincerly, iDroid.
